31 August 2013

Ninjas Considered Harmful

Handwritten by TVD

Please stop posting jobs for "_ _ _ ninjas." It is disrespectful to the ninja community, and confusing for ninjas actively looking for work:

discuss on twitter


every day thousands of developers use our charts & gauges to get the job done right
